name: A negligible quest
description:
Control scheme:

A - D to move from left to right
Q - W - E to switch targets
Backspace to stop an interaction
Arrow keys or numpad numbers to navigate through menues (mouse can be used too)
Enter/Space to select current button (left mouse click can be used too)

Credits:
Art: SwimmableBee912
Programming: KilThrall
Music and SFX: OQLQO
Game Design: SwimmableBee912 and KilThrall

For contact information of any of the participants, feel free to send a DM to KilThrall#8854 via Discord and we will reply as soon as posible.
